text: The environmental factor that can influenced the relocation of a company from  Lagos to Kano as a result  of high taxes and levies  is
explanation: the politicians determine taxes and levies that will be charged in their states . thus , if Kano political policies is friendly with business, they tend to see factories relocating from Lagos to Kano

text: An element of marketing mix that deals with the storage of food is?

text: Which of the following buyers of product is classified as a consumer markets?

explanation: Cognitive dissonance has to do with a customer's satisfaction with a product, even though the product may be harmful to him/her.

text: The first step in the marketing research process  is
explanation: In any research, the problem (purpose) for the research must be identified and defined.

text: Which of the following information would be relevant in marketing research for industrial goods?
explanation: For industrial goods, they usually last longer than a year; thus, one of the things that the market researcher for industrial goods will look out for is the life cycle of the product.

text:
KPKC Ltd bought 60 packs of beverages at # 150 each and sold them at a 20%  mark-up
Use the information above to answer this question 
The pricing strategy adopted by  KPKC Ltd is a?
explanation:
KPKC used a cost-plus pricing strategy because it uses mark-up
Cost = #150×60 = #9000
Mark-up = \(\frac{\text{profit}}{\text{cost}}\)
\(\frac{20}{100}\) = \(\frac{\text{profit}}{9000}\)
Profit = #1,800

text:

explanation:
KPKC used a cost-plus pricing strategy because it uses mark-up
Cost = #150×60 = #9000
Mark-up = \(\frac{\text{profit}}{\text{cost}}\)
\(\frac{20}{100}\) = \(\frac{\text{profit}}{9000}\)
Profit = #1,800

text:
KPKC Ltd bought 60 packs of beverages at # 150 each and sold them at a 20%  mark-up
Use the information above to answer this question 
The selling price per pack is?
explanation:
selling price =profit + cost
=#1,800 +#9,000
=#10,800

explanation: quantity discount is a discount given for buying some quantity of a product, say 10 units, for instance. This will encourage people to always buy 10 units rather than lesser units so as to enjoy the discount.

text: The use of private retail outlets in the sales and distribution of petroleum products in Nigeria is an example of

text: The process of attaching or printing information about a product on the package is

explanation: Distribution involves the movement of goods and salesperson from one location to another. ed

text:
Use the following information to answer this question 
Saka Ltd has decided to engage in international marketing but wants to minimize the risk involved.
Which of the following reasons would have influenced the company's decision?

options.A: increase regulation in the foreign market
options.B: high labour cost in the foreign market
options.C: low demand in the domestic market
options.D: availability of subsidies in the domestic market

explanation: It is regulation that contracts most companies.

text:
''Saka Ltd has decided to engage in the international market but wants to minimize the risk involved ''
What is the mode of entry that will be suitable for the company?
explanation: Export is easier to penetrate the international market.

text: An  association of traders belonging to the same line of business is a
explanation: When the members are in the same line, it is usually associated but when they are in different line, it is usually associated but when they are in different lines of business, it is usually union.

text: The process of entering a new market by paying a fee for using another company's brand name
explanation: Licensing allows a person or business to use the brand or brand name of another person or business organization.

text: Ernest Ltd.'s effort to promote and sell its fruit juice through the company's website is an example of
explanation: E-marketing involves using electronic means to sell a product or service.

text: Services offered to customers by a firm to encourage continuous patronage of company's product is
explanation: After-sales service involves assisting the buyers after sales have been completed. It may include delivery or maintenance. This will enable the buyer to continue patronizing the business.

text: Mr john, who identifies people's need for popcorn and meets it at a profit, is a
explanation: Marketing involves identifying people's need and trying to satisfy such need.

text: A factor that will be considered in the choice of transportation mode is
explanation: Location of customers is the main factor that is considered in choosing the mode of transporting a good to the customers. If the customers' line where only the ship that can reach them, then water (sea) transportation is used

text: One distinctive feature of a supermarket is
explanation: in most supermarkets, customers serve themselves; they are the ones who choose whatever they want
